title: Luxury goods market worldwide by segment share in 2007 and 2012
summary: This grouped bar chart has 5 categories for the x axis of Race representing 2007, and 2012.
The highest category is found at Fashion / Apparel with a mean value of 43.099999999999994.
The second highest category is found at Perfume & Cosmetics with a mean value of 18.049999999999997.
